attributes.action: To stop BT form pushing up phone charges.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
BT is pushing up charges by £4.50 per quarter because customers are not paying by Direct Debit. Don't let BT penalise you for doing so, fight back.
Remember BT will charge you £4.50 for customers paying by cash or cheque.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
